timeline.bodyText: Maybe you could do something like mcConnection.getChannel().pipeline().get(Connections.READ_TIMEOUT).setTimeout(server.getConfiguration().getReadTimeout()) so the re-instantiation of ReadTimeoutHandler isn't needed?
timeline.author: Mystiflow

replies.bodyText: I don't think such nanooptimization is useful, the gc already catches the non-used object right away.
